Football: UEFA Europa League - match: Aston Villa FC - FC Salzburg
programme.desc: The hosts are impressive in their form both domestically and in European cups.In the current edition of the Europa League, they lost only once - to Go Ahead Eagles (1-2), but since then they have won four in a row, including the last one over Fenerbahce (1-0).Aston Villa is already certain of promotion, taking second place in the table.The situation of the Austrians is definitely more difficult.RB Salzburg managed to win only two games and lost five.They are in a distant 28th place in the classification, and in order to advance to the play-off phase of the 1/16 finals, they must win in Birmingham and count on their rivals' mistakes.

programme.title: Football: UEFA Europa League - match: Real Betis Balompie - Feyenoord Rotterdam
Football: UEFA Conference League - match: Jagiellonia Białystok - KuPS Kuopio
programme.desc: At the halfway point of the regular phase of the Conference League, Pride of Podlasie is in thirteenth place, which guarantees seeding in the play-off phase.Adrian Siemieniec's players remain undefeated, but they cannot be proud of their last performance.They only drew 1-1 with Macedonian Shkendija and scored the equalizing goal in the tenth minute of added time.Jagiellonia has a match against KuPS Kuopio, which, like itself, has five points.The Finnish team will take to the field in Białystok encouraged by their 3-1 victory over Slovan Bratislava in the previous round.

programme.title: UEFA Europa League Archive
programme.sub-title: Odense - Wisła Kraków 01.12.2011 - sezon 2011/2012
programme.desc: In the program, viewers will see fragments of memorable matches played in the UEFA Europa League.From the 2009/2010 season, this competition replaced the previous UEFA Cup.The authors pay special attention to matches involving Polish clubs.The first Polish team to win the right to play in the LE group stage was Lech Poznań, later Wisła Kraków and Legia Warszawa also achieved this feat.The greatest success so far was promotion to the 1/16 finals of Lech in the 2010/2011 season, Legia and Wisła in the 2011/2012 season and Legia Warszawa in the 2014/2015 season.

Football: UEFA Conference League - match: Omonia FC - Raków Częstochowa
programme.desc: The Medals are one of three teams in the Conference League that have not yet been defeated in the regular round.The Częstochowa team has already secured their place in the knockout phase, but they do not intend to be satisfied with that.They are counting on direct promotion to the 1/8 finals, which will give them a place in the best eight at the end of the league phase of the competition.Before the clash with Omonia, coached by former Legia coach Henning Berg, they are in third place in the table.The team from Nicosia is fifteenth and has eight points, three less than Raków.

programme.sub-title: Lech Poznań - Juventus Turyn 01.12.2010 - sezon 2010/2011
programme.desc: In the program, viewers will see fragments of memorable matches played in the UEFA Europa League.From the 2009/2010 season, this competition replaced the previous UEFA Cup.The authors pay special attention to matches involving Polish clubs.The first Polish team to win the right to play in the LE group stage was Lech Poznań, later Wisła Kraków and Legia Warszawa also achieved this feat.The greatest success so far was promotion to the 1/16 finals of Lech in the 2010/2011 season, Legia and Wisła in the 2011/2012 season and Legia Warszawa in the 2014/2015 season.

programme.title: Football: UEFA Conference League - match: AZ Alkmaar - Jagiellonia Białystok
Football: UEFA Conference League - match: Omonia FC - Raków Częstochowa
programme.desc: The Medals are one of three teams in the Conference League that have not yet been defeated in the regular round.The Częstochowa team has already secured their place in the knockout phase, but they do not intend to be satisfied with that.They are counting on direct promotion to the 1/8 finals, which will give them a place in the best eight at the end of the league phase of the competition.Before the clash with Omonia, coached by former Legia coach Henning Berg, they are in third place in the table.The team from Nicosia is fifteenth and has eight points, three less than Raków.

programme.title: Football: UEFA Conference League - match: Legia Warszawa - Lincoln Red Imps FC
Football: UEFA Conference League - match: Jagiellonia Białystok - KuPS Kuopio
programme.desc: At the halfway point of the regular phase of the Conference League, Pride of Podlasie is in thirteenth place, which guarantees seeding in the play-off phase.Adrian Siemieniec's players remain undefeated, but they cannot be proud of their last performance.They only drew 1-1 with Macedonian Shkendija and scored the equalizing goal in the tenth minute of added time.Jagiellonia has a match against KuPS Kuopio, which, like itself, has five points.The Finnish team will take to the field in Białystok encouraged by their 3-1 victory over Slovan Bratislava in the previous round.

Football: UEFA Europa League - match: Aston Villa FC - FC Salzburg
programme.desc: The hosts are impressive in their form both domestically and in European cups.In the current edition of the Europa League, they lost only once - to Go Ahead Eagles (1-2), but since then they have won four in a row, including the last one over Fenerbahce (1-0).Aston Villa is already certain of promotion, taking second place in the table.The situation of the Austrians is definitely more difficult.RB Salzburg managed to win only two games and lost five.They are in a distant 28th place in the classification, and in order to advance to the play-off phase of the 1/16 finals, they must win in Birmingham and count on their rivals' mistakes.

programme.desc: The match at the top of the English women's league.Manchester City's players are the leaders with twelve wins and only one defeat.In the last series of matches they defeated London City Lionesses 2:1.Chelsea is placed lower, nine points behind the Citizens.The team from London made their fight for the championship more difficult with a 0-2 defeat against Arsenal in the previous round.However, Chelsea will enter the next match encouraged by their 1-0 victory over Manchester City in the semi-final of the domestic cup.

Men's basketball: ORLEN Basket Liga - match: AMW Arka Gdynia - Anwil Włocławek
programme.desc: In the previous round, Anwil and Arka had to swallow the bitterness of defeat in the ORLEN Basket League.Both teams lost to their rivals only slightly - the Włocławek team was one point worse than GTK Gliwice (86:87), and the Gdynia team was two points worse than Stal Ostrów Wielkopolski (82:84).The hosts are considered favorites in this match.Jakub Garbacz and company are much higher in the table than Anwil (third, and their rivals ninth).They won six out of eight matches on their home court this season, while the Rottweilers returned from away games with the shield only twice.In addition, they have a psychological advantage over Anwil's basketball players.They defeated them 108:98 in the previous match, played on October 10.

programme.desc: The match at the top of the English women's league.Manchester City's players are the leaders with twelve wins and only one defeat.In the last series of matches they defeated London City Lionesses 2:1.Chelsea is placed lower, nine points behind the Citizens.The team from London made their fight for the championship more difficult with a 0-2 defeat against Arsenal in the previous round.However, Chelsea will enter the next match encouraged by their 1-0 victory over Manchester City in the semi-final of the domestic cup.

Men's basketball: ORLEN Basket Liga - match: AMW Arka Gdynia - Anwil Włocławek
programme.desc: In the previous round, Anwil and Arka had to swallow the bitterness of defeat in the ORLEN Basket League.Both teams lost to their rivals only slightly - the Włocławek team was one point worse than GTK Gliwice (86:87), and the Gdynia team was two points worse than Stal Ostrów Wielkopolski (82:84).The hosts are considered favorites in this match.Jakub Garbacz and company are much higher in the table than Anwil (third, and their rivals ninth).They won six out of eight matches on their home court this season, while the Rottweilers returned from away games with the shield only twice.In addition, they have a psychological advantage over Anwil's basketball players.They defeated them 108:98 in the previous match, played on October 10.

programme.desc: The most important event of the gala at the T-Mobile Arena in Paradise will be the fight for the lightweight championship belt, which Islam Makachev recently renounced.Former champion of this division Charles Oliveira and Ilia Topuria want to take over the title.For the German, the featherweight champion, it will be his debut in a higher category.Alexandre Pantoja will defend his flyweight title for the fourth time.Kai Kara-France will challenge the Brazilian.The confrontation between Mateusz Gamrot's club friend, Renato Moicano, and the Pole's former rival, Beneil Dariush, also promises to be interesting.
